name: Space Traveller
description:
<>

A rocket navigating space and all the electronic systems in it are disrupted by matter a few light-years away. Having barely landed on the nearest planet, the astronaut asks the rocket's artificial intelligence, Echo, what's going on. Echo explains the situation and says that the materials needed to repair the rocket were found on the planet, so the astronaut's adventure of exploring the planet and finding the materials begins. However, there are two things he doesn't know, cute yet dangerous creatures, and that the substance that spoils the rocket also spoils his gun at certain intervals.

alper ertuğrul
